Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 観光客
Entry.EnglishText: Tourist

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒場
Entry.EnglishText: Tavern

Entry.JapaneseText: せっかくバルカまで来たんだもの。 カレギア城も見に行かないとね。
Entry.EnglishText: The journey to Balka was not easy. I cannot wait to see Callegea Castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: 来るヒューマとの戦いに向け、 今、我らガジュマは 一丸となるべき時なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: In the coming battle against the Huma, we Gajuma must fight as one!

Entry.JapaneseText: この大事な時期に、 ヒューマとつるむとは 感心できんな！
Entry.EnglishText: I cannot believe you keep Huma in your company, especially in these trying times.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの行動は常に 監視されているのを 忘れるなよ！
Entry.EnglishText: The actions of all Huma are subject to surveillance at all times. This is your only warning.

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬を売ってるところ？ 貴様、旅人か!?
Entry.EnglishText: You do not know where you can buy medicine? Are you a dang tourist or something?
Entry.Notes: Apparently unhelpful guard during a find some medicine quest.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、バルカのガジュマと ヒューマはの関係は、 非常に緊迫している。
Entry.EnglishText: In Balka, there is a lot of tension between the Gajuma and the Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 用事が済み次第、即座に 宿屋にでも戻れるんだ！ わかったら、さっさと行け！
Entry.EnglishText: You must return to the inn immediately upon completion of your errands. Now, hurry up!

Entry.JapaneseText: 来るヒューマとの戦いに向け、 今、我らガジュマは 一丸となるべき時なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: In the coming battle against the Huma, we Gajuma must fight as one!

Entry.JapaneseText: この大事な時期に、 ヒューマとつるむとは 感心できんな！
Entry.EnglishText: I cannot believe you keep Huma in your company, especially in these trying times.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの行動は、常に 監視されているのを忘れるなよ！
Entry.EnglishText: The actions of all Huma are subject to surveillance at all times. This is your only warning.

Entry.JapaneseText: 来るヒューマとの戦いに向け、 今、我らガジュマは 一丸となるべき時なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: In the coming battle against the Huma, we Gajuma must fight as one!

Entry.JapaneseText: この大事な時期に、 ヒューマとつるむとは 感心できんな！
Entry.EnglishText: I cannot believe you keep Huma in your company, especially in these trying times.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの行動は常に 監視されているのを 忘れるなよ！
Entry.EnglishText: The actions of all Huma are subject to surveillance at all times. This is your only warning.

Entry.JapaneseText: 地鳴りの原因は、現在、 全力で調査中だ。
Entry.EnglishText: We currently are dirverting all of our resources to investigate the source of the tremor.
Entry.Notes: rumbling? earth quake? ground shake? unclear what is happening out of context.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは外出を控えるよう 通達が出ているはずだ！ むやみに出歩くな！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma should be ordered to stay inside. Their kind need to keep off the streets!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か恐ろしい事が起きている。 だが、上からは命令が下りて来ない。 このままでいいのか……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Horrible things are happening yet we are not receiving any orders. What the hell is going on...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは外出を控えるよう 通達が出ているはずだ！ むやみに出歩くな！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma should be ordered to stay inside. Their kind need to keep off the streets!

Entry.JapaneseText: 四星のワルトゥ様が、全軍の 指揮を執られているそうだ。 指令系統の混乱が収まった。
Entry.EnglishText: Walto of the Four Stars now leads the entire army. The issues with chain of command are no more.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今は、バイラスの排除と 種族の別なく<Yellow>ヒト<White>を守れとの 命令が出ている！
Entry.EnglishText: To eradicate all Biruses, we must unite as <Yellow>Human<White> regardless of race.
Entry.Notes: Unclear if it's we must join forces to defeat Birsues or we must band together against the Birsues.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一見、穏やかに見えるが この街のヒューマたちの ガジュマへの対抗意識は強い。
Entry.EnglishText: Although it seems peaceful, the animosity between the Gajuma and Huma rages on beneath the surface.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつ争いが起きてもおかしくない。 それがバルカの現状だ……
Entry.EnglishText: A battle could errupt at any moment. I never thought this would be the state of Balka...
Entry.Notes: Unclear if it's a fight between nations or a conflict among the Huma/Gajuma. May need to be edited based on story context.

Entry.JapaneseText: すぐそこの石門から、 街の外へ出られる。
Entry.EnglishText: This stone gate leads directly out of the city.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこの緑色した鉄のアーチを 抜ければ城の前に出られるぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: The castle is just beyond the green metal archway.

Entry.JapaneseText: やや……おまえら…… ……違うかな……
Entry.EnglishText: Hold on... Could you be... Nevermind.

Entry.JapaneseText: 対立し、争いを起こしているのは 一般市民だけではない……
Entry.EnglishText: It is not just among the citizenry where conflicts are brewing...

Entry.JapaneseText: 実は、軍の中でも種族別に 派閥争いが起きているんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: In fact, there is tension even among those serving in the military.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのガジュマに対する 対抗意識が争いの原因だ。
Entry.EnglishText: It all stems from the conflict between the Huma and the Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: くれぐれも、ガジュマを 挑発するような事は するんじゃないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Please, do not do anything to provoke the Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 城へ戻って来るようにと 言われていたんだが、 このままでは遅れちまう。
Entry.EnglishText: I have orders to return to the castle but my replacement is running late.
Entry.Notes: Unclear if this is related to the next line or not. I have translated it as such.

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く交替が 来てくれないかな…… そろそろ時間なんだよな……
Entry.EnglishText: My shift is already over... Where the hell is my replacement?
Entry.Notes: See line before. May not be related but I translated it as such.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、あんたの連れの女…… 陛下によく似ているな……
Entry.EnglishText: That woman you have traveling with you looks a lot like her majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん、ご本人であるはずないが、 それにしてもよく似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it isn't her. But the resemblance is uncanny...

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、おまえの連れの女…… 陛下によく似ているな……
Entry.EnglishText: That woman you have traveling with you looks a lot like her majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん、ご本人であるはずないが、 それにしてもよく似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it isn't her. But the resemblance is uncanny...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……違う…… アガーテじゃない……
おい、おまえの連れの女…… 陛下によく似ているな……
Entry.EnglishText: That woman you have traveling with you looks a lot like her majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん、ご本人であるはずないが、 それにしてもよく似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it isn't her. But the resemblance is uncanny...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様の指揮のもと、 我らガジュマは団結し、 ヒューマとの戦いに備えるのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Under the leadership of Lord Zilva, the Gajuma are united and are prepared for battle against the Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 平和なカレギアを 取り戻すために！
Entry.EnglishText: To restore peace to Callegea!

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、おまえの連れの女…… 陛下によく似ているな……
Entry.EnglishText: That woman you have traveling with you looks a lot like her majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん、ご本人であるはずないが、 それにしてもよく似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it isn't her. But the resemblance is uncanny...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……違う…… アガーテじゃない……
おい、ヒューマの娘、 何をウロウロしている？ よそ者か？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma girl, why are you loitering about? Are you an outsider or something?

Entry.JapaneseText: 機関車に乗りたいなら、 城門前から乗れるぞ。 覚えておきな！
Entry.EnglishText: If you wish to ride the locomotive, you can get on it in front of the castle gate. Don't forget!
Entry.Notes: 機関車 = locomotive; unsure if it should stay as such or be translated to something like train.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、おまえの連れの女…… 陛下によく似ているな……
Entry.EnglishText: That woman you have traveling with you looks a lot like her majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろん、ご本人であるはずないが、 それにしてもよく似ている……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it isn't her. But the resemblance is uncanny...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様の指揮のもと、 我らガジュマは団結し、 ヒューマとの戦いに備えるのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Under the leadership of Lord Zilva, the Gajuma are united and are prepared for battle against the Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 平和なカレギアを 取り戻すために！
Entry.EnglishText: To restore peace to Callegea!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは、家で おとなしくしていろ。 許可なく街を歩くな！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma, remain in your homes and stay outta trouble. Do not roam the streets without permission!

Entry.JapaneseText: 心配はいらない。 バルカで異変が起きていると言う 報告は、今のところない。
Entry.EnglishText: There is no cause for worry. There are no reports of any suspicious activity in Balka.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちヒューマは、 地鳴りの前に、自分たちの 今後を心配したらどうだ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Why don't you Huma worry about your own future and less about the tremors!?
Entry.Notes: Unsure what the tremor is referencing.

Entry.JapaneseText: 心配はいらない。 バルカで異変が起きていると言う 報告は、今のところない。
Entry.EnglishText: There is no cause for worry. There are no reports of any suspicious activity in Balka.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちヒューマは、 ラジルダの事より、自分たちの 今後を心配したらどうだ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Why don't you Huma worry less about Razilda and more about your own future!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 街のいたるところに バイラスが出て、 大混乱が起きている……!!
Entry.EnglishText: There are Birsues throughout the city. All hell is breaking loose!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>ラドラスの落日<White>の 再現のようだ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: This is just like the <Blue>Dusk of Ladras<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスのみならず、 ヒューマの暴徒どもが 混乱に拍車をかけているんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: As if the Biruses weren't enough, a mob of Huma is adding to the chaos.

Entry.JapaneseText: 少しでも良心があるなら、 おまえの同族どもを おとなしくさせろ！
Entry.EnglishText: If you had any conscious at all, you would tell your kind to stand down!

Entry.JapaneseText: 四星のミリッツァ様が、 最前線で戦っておられるそうだ！ 俺もやらなくては……！
Entry.EnglishText: Master Militsa of the Four Stars is fighting on the front lines. I must join them!

Entry.JapaneseText: いくら軍が監視を強化しても、 いさかいが絶えないのはなぜだ…… やはり原因はヒューマか……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Despite our increased surveillance, incidents are still on the rise... Are the Huma really to blame...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく、バタバタと 騒がしいなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: There is quite the kerfuffle...

Entry.JapaneseText: 兵隊とちっこいガジュマの男が この通りを街の広場の方へ 走って行ってさ……
Entry.EnglishText: I saw a soldier and this little Gajuma running down the street toward the town square...

Entry.JapaneseText: これって言うのも、 ヨソ者が増えたせいだな……
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe this is due to the increase of foreigners...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、よそ者が増えて困るよ。 ま、枯れ木も山のにぎわいって 言うからね。
Entry.EnglishText: Some people are worried about the increase in outsiders. I think it is all a matter of perspective.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様のお披露目の儀式を 盛り上げるには いいかもしれないな。
Entry.EnglishText: The inaguration ceremony for her Majesty should liven things up around here!

Entry.JapaneseText: 品のないよその連中が 城で暴れたってね。
Entry.EnglishText: Those disgraceful outsiders showed no respect at the castle.
Entry.Notes: I assume this is referencing something that happens at the castle, but I'm not quite sure what.

Entry.JapaneseText: 実際、品のあるこの街には 似つかわしくない連中が 増えたよ……まったく……
Entry.EnglishText: In fact, I feel like I see more and more folk who do not belong in our classy city...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマかよ…… バルカとガジュマ…… 似つかわしくないなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: The Balkans and the Gajuma... They don't belong together...

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下はご病気だと言われてるが、 本当は国王になるのがイヤで 逃げたって言う噂もあるぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: They say the Queen is ill, but I heard a rumor she ran away and just doesn't want to rule.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今こそ……ヒューマの王を…… いやいや……なんでもない……
Entry.EnglishText: If that is true... then a Huma will rule... No, that's absurd.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……言わなくてもわかるだろう？ 今時、ガジュマと話すヒューマ なんていないぜ！ フン！
Entry.EnglishText: ...But I don't have to tell you that, right? Gajuma and Huma could never get along. Hmph!
Entry.Notes: I don't know what this guy is trying to say. Translated as though its part of the previous line.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでも、アガーテ女王は ベルサスにいたんだってな。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Queen Agarte was in Belsas.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり病気じゃなかったんだな。 本当に国王になりたくなかったの かもしれないな……
Entry.EnglishText: I suppose she isn't ill at all. Maybe she really just didn't want to rule...

Entry.JapaneseText: 信ぴょう性は薄いけど、 ベルサスのヒューマが女王を 処刑しようとしたってウワサもある。
Entry.EnglishText: Though less credible, there are rumors that the Huma of Belsas tried to execute the Queen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当に処刑されてたら、 今ごろヒューマの王様が 誕生してたかも……
Entry.EnglishText: If they really did execute her, we would have a Huma ruler by now...

Entry.JapaneseText: さては君たち、田舎者だね？ この街の大きさに 戸惑っているんだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all from the country? Hopefully the vastness of the city isn't overwhelming.

Entry.JapaneseText: まあ、困ったら、 都生まれ、都育ちの このボクに聞きたまえ。
Entry.EnglishText: I was born and raised in this city. If you get lost, you can always ask me for help.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『進路案内板』 ←カレギア城方面 →バルカ出口方面
早く……薬を 届けてあげないと……
薬……誰か薬がどこにあるか、 知ってる人はいないかしら……
